Bootstrap-Admin-Template

An Admin Template Based On Twitter Bootstrap 3.x

Building

2.3.2 Version

required node.js & bower & grunt 

    $ cd yourfoldername
    $ npm install
    $ npm run build
    $ grunt serve

Credits

  • node.js
  • bower
  • Grunt
  • Assemble
